collections.name: Oceana
collections.description: Inspired by Australia's coastal waters and marine life

collections.name: Everyday
collections.description: Timeless pieces for daily wear and special occasions

collections.name: Bespoke
collections.description: Custom-made pieces tailored to your unique style

products.name: Fluid Ring
products.description: A stunning fluid ring featuring 9K gold with sapphire accents. This piece showcases the perfect balance of elegance and sophistication, making it an ideal choice for those who appreciate fine craftsmanship and timeless beauty.

products.name: Wakame Threader
products.description: Elegant sterling silver threader earrings inspired by ocean seaweed. The delicate design captures the organic flow of marine life, creating a unique and wearable piece of art.

products.name: Kelp Pendant
products.description: Beautiful kelp-inspired pendant in sterling silver. This piece reflects the natural beauty of Australia's coastal waters, with intricate detailing that mimics the graceful movement of underwater plants.

products.name: Waterway Studs
products.description: Sophisticated 9K gold studs with water-inspired design. These elegant earrings feature a unique pattern that evokes the gentle flow of water, perfect for everyday wear or special occasions.

products.name: Ripple Ring
products.description: Delicate ripple ring in sterling silver. Inspired by the gentle ripples on water's surface, this ring features a subtle texture that catches the light beautifully and adds dimension to any outfit.

products.name: Elaz Threader
products.description: Minimalist sterling silver threader earrings. Clean lines and simple elegance make these earrings versatile for any occasion, from casual day wear to sophisticated evening events.
